about_me.des:
I am an an engineer who specializes in python and web development, server configuration (ubuntu + nginx), ansible, aws and automating of those aformentioned tasks.
                    As well I love learning new things and implementing better techniques how to solve problems. I live in Edmonton, Alberta with my girlfriend and two cats.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.strathcom_des: Currently I am at Strathcom Media as a python Developer for internal systems. Along with development I use Ansible to automate server, database and networking infrastructure on Amazon Web Services.
career.interdynamix_des: Creating virtualization and storage solutions for customers with Vmware and Netapp, as well as writing python code for ops.
career.telus_des: At Telus I built some networking tools in python, as well as creating and maintaining various business reporting and efficiency tools written in php.
career.college_des: In 2013, I graduated from the University of Alberta with a degree in Electrical Engineering.
